title: Nursing Practice-Centered Chemistry Simulation Laboratory Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of general chemistry and biochemistry, with nursing practice experience
context.additional_context: Job-integrated simulation activities for practicing nurses utilizing smartphone-based electronic lab notebooks.

learning_goals: Solve real chemical problems encountered in nursing settings (e.g., drug reactions, body fluid analysis) via simulation experiments.
Systematically record and manage experimental data using an Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN) and interpret clinical implications.
Cultivate the ability to apply chemical experiment results to nursing intervention plans through team-based project execution.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
